code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Card,Col,Form,Input,Row}from'antd';import ImageUploadSingle from'../../components/image-upload-single';import installationService from'../../services/installation';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ProjectInfo(_ref){let{next}=_ref;const[form]=Form.useForm();const[logo,setLogo]=useState(null);const[favicon,setFavicon]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const onFinish=values=>{const data={...values,favicon:values.favicon.name,logo:values.logo.name,delivery:'1',multy_shop:'1'};setLoading(true);installationService.setInitFile(data).then(()=>next()).finally(()=>setLoading(false));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:"Project info",className:"w-100",extra:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Information required for the project"}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{layout:"vertical",name:"project-init",form:form,onFinish:onFinish,initialValues:{multy_shop:'1',delivery:'1'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{gutter:24,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{span:8,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Item,{label:"Title",name:"name",rules:[{required:true,message:'Missing project name'}],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Item,{label:"Logo",name:"logo",rules:[{required:true,message:'Missing project logo'}],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ImageUploadSingle,{type:"shops",image:logo,setImage:setLogo,form:form,name:"logo"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Item,{label:"Favicon",name:"favicon",rules:[{required:true,message:'Missing project favicon'}],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ImageUploadSingle,{type:"shops",image:favicon,setImage:setFavicon,form:form,name:"favicon"})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",htmlType:"submit",loading:loading,children:"Save"})]})});}
